page.title: 06The School
page.content: Our school is made of flints and brick. In our class there are 14 children and our teacher{Mr Houghton who is our headteacher.In the next class they have 17 children and their teacher is{Miss Strubbe.}The Infants class has 18 children and their teacher is{Mrs Moate. Our school was built in 1834 at the cost of Â£70 the money was left by {Nathaneil Bailey}in 1823.The school Board was formed in 1873,as a result of the 1870 Education Act,and a new school was rebuilt in 1875 for Â£700,the site being given by{Lord {Ashburton.The school was further {enlarged before the 1914_1918 war.Today the school is maintained by the{Hampshire Education}Authority,and caters for the Education of children between the ages of 5 and 11 yrs {by Elizabeth Coffen,Sarah Diaper
